tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_reports (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  progress_notes TEXT,
  treatment_outcomes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    treatment_start_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE progress_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    symptoms VARCHAR,
    treatment_response VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(100),
  diagnosis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_date DATE,
  treatment_description TEXT,
  treatment_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProgressReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  report_date DATETIME,
  therapist_notes TEXT,
  progress_status VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  treatment_start_date DATE,
  treatment_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Progress (
  progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_id INT,
  progress_description TEXT,
  progress_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Outcomes (
  outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_id INT,
  outcome_description TEXT,
  outcome_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_name VARCHAR(255),
    treatment_date DATE,
    notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE progress_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    progress_description TEXT,
    outcome_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    lead_researcher VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_results TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES progress_reports(report_id)
);
